summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 55 and 56, Denny & Hoyts Addition, being the alley between West Cremona Street and West Bertona Street, from 3rd Avenue West to West Nickerson Street; and certain other alleys, streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15717 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
